Title: Relates to the metropolitan commuter transportation authority establishing and implementing a vegetation management policy
Summary: Relates to the metropolitan commuter transportation authority establishing and implementing a policy for responsible management of vegetation and other activities that impact neighboring properties in order to preserve the safety and efficiency of commuter rail operations by implementing guidelines for removal and management policies.
LawCode: Amd ยง1266, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the metropolitan commuter transportation authority establishing and implementing a vegetation management policy
